ModMetaData.name: Fabled Cervidae
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: steveo.o steam: Scurvyez
A mod focused solely on deer-like creatures. Some of the animals in this mod are taken straight from my other, outdated mod called "Steve's Animals". I am breaking that old mod up into its constituent parts with new and improves code, textures, and behavior.
Currently, there are 4. The Scire, Infernihart, Auravine, and Mirelung.
Compatibilities: - *good to add mid-save - Alpha Implants - Alpha Biomes - Regrowth: Core - Regrowth: Aspen Forest - Regrowth: Boiling Forest - Medieval Overhaul - More Vanilla Biomes
Incompatibilities: - *shouldn't be any :) - reports without proper logs will be ignored as per my last email
Features: - All species have sexual dimorphism to some degree meaning the males and females have different physical characteristics such as colors and patterns. - Each species has unique immunities to various afflictions which can be passed on to masters. - Some species have random antler pairings for more variation in the male sex. - Some species gain movement boosts during certain weather anomalies as well. - Members of the same species will also fight each other over territorial disputes from time to time. - Each species has corresponding genes for immunizations and skin color.
